meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> that is <radical>white</radical> is the most scary tsunami of all. It doesn't come in and destroy everything. No, it comes in, goes inside your door, then stays at your place <kanji>overnight</kanji>, without even asking!
readingMnemonic: Your cat walks up to the white tsunami that's staying <kanji>overnight</kanji> and decides it doesn't like it, so it <reading>hack</reading>s (はく) up a hairball on it. Even that doesn't get the tsunami to leave.
